<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#42; Improve cost-modeling, e.g. choose different number of rows/columns</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     columns for tiles, consider cost of copies on alias.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Match any mul operation (fp or integer).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LTy, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RTy&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110" lineLink="#ad3ea8483bb698ffc64dc1adf7c84a098"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#ad3ea8483bb698ffc64dc1adf7c84a098">m&#95;AnyMul</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LTy &amp;L, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RTy &amp;R) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#afc43bc5ec4b20c7c5d663bef90da6066">m&#95;CombineOr</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a532515120d78196926b68c48460087ab">m&#95;Mul</a>(L, R), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a2473234214d47e1991056897d735d82d">m&#95;FMul</a>(L, R));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Match any add operation (fp or integer).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LTy, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RTy&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116" lineLink="#a93a97c876de2b13925eedd660ac411f9"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a93a97c876de2b13925eedd660ac411f9">m&#95;AnyAdd</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LTy &amp;L, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RTy &amp;R) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#afc43bc5ec4b20c7c5d663bef90da6066">m&#95;CombineOr</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a062ccd76a126632721e9aa09775d6c0e">m&#95;Add</a>(L, R), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a4ea054dc4c7dd6b5a27eaf33b7fa20b5">m&#95;FAdd</a>(L, R));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Given an element pointer \\p BasePtr to the start of a (sub) matrix, compute</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the start address of vector \\p VecIdx with type (\\p EltType x \\p NumElements)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// assuming \\p Stride elements between start two consecutive vectors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// \\p Stride must be &gt;= \\p NumElements.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For column-major matrixes, the function computes the address of a column</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// vectors and \\p NumElements must be set to the number of elements in a column</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (= number of rows of the matrix). For row-major matrixes, the function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// computes the address of a row vector and \\p NumElements must be set to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// number of elements in a column (= number of columns of the matrix).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Consider a 4x4 matrix in column-mjaor layout like below</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      0       1      2      3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 0   v&#95;0&#95;0  v&#95;0&#95;1  v&#95;0&#95;2  v&#95;0&#95;3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1   v&#95;1&#95;0  v&#95;1&#95;1  v&#95;1&#95;2  v&#95;1&#95;3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2   v&#95;2&#95;0  v&#95;2&#95;1  v&#95;2&#95;2  v&#95;2&#95;3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3   v&#95;3&#95;0  v&#95;3&#95;1  v&#95;3&#95;2  v&#95;3&#95;3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To compute the column addresses for a 2x3 sub-matrix at row 1 and column 1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we need a pointer to the first element of the submatrix as base pointer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Then we can use computeVectorAddr to compute the addresses for the columns</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the sub-matrix.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Column 0: computeVectorAddr(Base, 0 (column), 4 (stride), 2 (num rows), ..)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           -&gt; just returns Base</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Column 1: computeVectorAddr(Base, 1 (column), 4 (stride), 2 (num rows), ..)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           -&gt; returns Base + (1 &#42; 4)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Column 2: computeVectorAddr(Base, 2 (column), 4 (stride), 2 (num rows), ..)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           -&gt; returns Base + (2 &#42; 4)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The graphic below illustrates the number of elements in a column (marked</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with |) and the number of skipped elements (marked with &#125;).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         v&#95;0&#95;0  v&#95;0&#95;1 &#123;v&#95;0&#95;2 &#123;v&#95;0&#95;3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                Base   Col 1  Col 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                  |     |      |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         v&#95;1&#95;0 |v&#95;1&#95;1 |v&#95;1&#95;2 |v&#95;1&#95;3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         v&#95;2&#95;0 |v&#95;2&#95;1 |v&#95;2&#95;2 |v&#95;2&#95;3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         v&#95;3&#95;0 &#123;v&#95;3&#95;1 &#123;v&#95;3&#95;2  v&#95;3&#95;3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/#a827ab2e54dd47060734cc255e8af3bb9"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/#a827ab2e54dd47060734cc255e8af3bb9">computeVectorAddr</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;BasePtr, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;VecIdx, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Stride,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElements, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;EltType,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> &amp;Builder) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(Stride) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(Stride)-&gt;getZExtValue() &gt;= NumElements) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Stride must be &gt;= the number of elements in the result vector.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the start of the vector with index VecIdx as VecIdx &#42; Stride.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;VecStart = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aecd40f9a16dc0ef1e0bc416599f89277">CreateMul</a>(VecIdx, Stride, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;vec.start&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get pointer to the start of the selected vector. Skip GEP creation,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if we select vector 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(VecStart) &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(VecStart)-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/lint-cpp/#a45005634b54e2126cb3e6ec0dbc9ade4">isZero</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">    VecStart = BasePtr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">    VecStart = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a73e0482b96d9d0cdfcc90c0a34f5b0db">CreateGEP</a>(EltType, BasePtr, VecStart, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;vec.gep&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VecStart;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// LowerMatrixIntrinsics contains the methods used to lower matrix intrinsics.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Currently, the lowering for each matrix intrinsic is done as follows:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 1 Propagate the shape information from intrinsics to connected</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 2 Lower instructions with shape information (assuming column-major layout).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  The lowering works similarly using row-major layout.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  2.1. Get column vectors for each argument. If we already lowered the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       definition of an argument, use the produced column vectors directly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       If not, split the operand vector containing an embedded matrix into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       a set of column vectors,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  2.2. Lower the instruction in terms of column major operations, which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       yields a set of column vectors containing result matrix. Note that we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       lower all instructions that have shape information. Besides the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       intrinsics, this includes stores for example.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  2.3. Update uses of the lowered instruction. If we have shape information</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       for a user, there is nothing to do, as we will look up the result</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       column matrix when lowering the user. For other uses, we embed the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       result matrix in a flat vector and update the use.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  2.4. Cache the result column matrix for the instruction we lowered</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 3 After we lowered all instructions in a function, remove the now</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    obsolete instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/#aecb18b3bdad8c28a5e4b0dcf73c17211">LowerMatrixIntrinsics</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;Func;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;DL;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> &amp;TTI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adce09a5a0de0e3177eb00e932734af2f">FunctionAnalysisManager</a> &#42;AM;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae457f1cf451ed893666c4a384e58f8e5">AliasAnalysis</a> &#42;AA = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &#42;DT = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationremarkemitter">OptimizationRemarkEmitter</a> &#42;ORE = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Contains estimates of the number of operations (loads, stores, compute) required to lower a matrix operation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">OpInfoTy &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Number of stores emitted to generate this matrix.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumStores = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Number of loads emitted to generate this matrix.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumLoads = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Number of compute operations emitted to generate this matrix.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumComputeOps = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Most of the time transposes can be fused with matrix multiplies or can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// be folded away via algebraic simplifications.  This is the number of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// transposes that we failed to make &quot;free&quot; via such optimizations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumExposedTransposes = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OpInfoTy &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a34adc9d568f5992da64241a5e1a04741">operator+=</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OpInfoTy &amp;RHS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NumStores += RHS.NumStores;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NumLoads += RHS.NumLoads;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NumComputeOps += RHS.NumComputeOps;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NumExposedTransposes += RHS.NumExposedTransposes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Maps instructions to their shape information. The shape information</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// describes the shape to be used while lowering. This matches the shape of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the result value of the instruction, with the only exceptions being store</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// instructions and the matrix&#95;column&#95;major&#95;store intrinsics. For those, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// shape information indicates that those instructions should be lowered</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// using shape information as well. Note that extra care is needed when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// erasing or RAUW&#39;ing a value that is present in ShapeMap. If the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// replacement is also a matrix operation, use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// updateShapeAndReplaceAllUsesWith to make sure the replacement is added to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// ShapeMap.  We don&#39;t use ValueMap, as there are also cases where we do not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// want to add shape information for a replacement instruction. When directly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// erasing a value with an entry in ShapeMap, use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// eraseFromParentAndRemoveFromShapeMap to make sure ShapeMap is also updated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// accordingly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;Value &#42;, ShapeInfo&gt;</a> ShapeMap;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// List of instructions to remove. While lowering, we are not replacing all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// users of a lowered instruction, if shape information is available and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// those need to be removed after we finished lowering.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Instruction &#42;, 16&gt;</a> ToRemove;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If we lowered \\p MatrixVal, just return the cache result matrix. Otherwise</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// split the flat vector \\p MatrixVal containing a matrix with shape \\p SI</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/#aad5def33faf75944be159808071d9698"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MatrixTy <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/#aad5def33faf75944be159808071d9698">getMatrix</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;MatrixVal, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ShapeInfo &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> &amp;Builder) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if we lowered MatrixVal using shape information. In that case,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// return the existing matrix, if it matches the requested shape</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// information. If there is a mis-match, embed the result in a flat</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// vector and split it later.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Found = Inst2ColumnMatrix.find(MatrixVal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Found != Inst2ColumnMatrix.end()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MatrixTy &amp;M = Found-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return the found matrix, if its shape matches the requested shape</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// information</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>.NumRows == M.getNumRows() &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>.NumColumns == M.getNumColumns())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> M;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MatrixVal = M.embedInVector(Builder);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise split MatrixVal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Value &#42;, 16&gt;</a> SplitVecs;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;SplitVecs&#125;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Add a new entry to ShapeMap for \\p New with \\p Old&#39;s shape info, erase the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/#a90987ac6a5075492b12b46acd6e9814c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/#a90987ac6a5075492b12b46acd6e9814c">updateShapeAndReplaceAllUsesWith</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp;Old, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;New) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to remove Old from the ShapeMap otherwise RAUW will replace it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with New. We should only add New it it supportsShapeInfo so we insert</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it conditionally instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> S = ShapeMap.find(&amp;Old);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Sink a top-level transpose inside matmuls and adds.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This creates and erases instructions as needed, and returns the newly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// created instruction while updating the iterator to avoid invalidation. If</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1394"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ShapeMap.find(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>) == ShapeMap.end())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1403"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CanBeFlattened(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1405"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Roughly estimate the cost for embedding the columns into a vector.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1406"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 1; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1407"><span class="doxyHighlight">          EmbedCost +=</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1408"><span class="doxyHighlight">              TTI.getShuffleCost(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#af46433d0e36d3f80afc3a8c67b5c53ecaa9e18b2636661e341804da24971997df">TTI::SK&#95;Splice</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype/#af9a870d5df50fe0133a410b7c9114c80">FixedVectorType::get</a>(EltTy, 1),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1409"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 &#123;&#125;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bba59b32ea7b6f10564abd40ad90602ca5b">TTI::TCK&#95;RecipThroughput</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1410"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EmbedCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1411"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1412"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1413"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a0698afabe907d2d3b87889d2e0349d47">m&#95;BinOp</a>()) &amp;&amp; ShapeMap.find(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>) != ShapeMap.end()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1414"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> OriginalCost =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1415"><span class="doxyHighlight">            TTI.getArithmeticInstrCost(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>)-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanslp-cpp/#a06b4f19004df11b338ccc7e73bf47ab4">getOpcode</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1416"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       EltTy) &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1417"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1418"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> NewCost = TTI.getArithmeticInstrCost(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1419"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>)-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanslp-cpp/#a06b4f19004df11b338ccc7e73bf47ab4">getOpcode</a>(), VecTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1420"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewCost - OriginalCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1421"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1422"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1423"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a3c0adc1054838f4498e0e860b637a22b">m&#95;Intrinsic&lt;Intrinsic::matrix&#95;transpose&gt;</a>())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1424"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The transpose can be skipped for the dot product lowering, roughly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1425"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// estimate the savings as the cost of embedding the columns in a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1426"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// vector.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1427"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> EmbedCost(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1428"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 1; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1429"><span class="doxyHighlight">          EmbedCost -=</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1430"><span class="doxyHighlight">              TTI.getShuffleCost(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#af46433d0e36d3f80afc3a8c67b5c53ecaa9e18b2636661e341804da24971997df">TTI::SK&#95;Splice</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype/#af9a870d5df50fe0133a410b7c9114c80">FixedVectorType::get</a>(EltTy, 1),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1431"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 &#123;&#125;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bba59b32ea7b6f10564abd40ad90602ca5b">TTI::TCK&#95;RecipThroughput</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1432"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EmbedCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1433"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1434"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1435"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Costs for loads.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1436"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> == 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1437"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a>(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1438"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1439"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TTI.getMemoryOpCost(Instruction::Load, VecTy, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(1), 0) -</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1440"><span class="doxyHighlight">             <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> &#42; TTI.getMemoryOpCost(Instruction::Load, EltTy, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(1), 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1441"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1442"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1443"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Iterate over LHS and operations feeding LHS and check if it is profitable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1444"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to flatten the visited ops.  For each op, we compute the difference</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1445"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// between the flattened and matrix versions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1446"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;Value &#42;, 4&gt;</a> Seen;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1447"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Value &#42;&gt;</a> WorkList;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1448"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Value &#42;&gt;</a> ToFlatten;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1449"><span class="doxyHighlight">    WorkList.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(LHS);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1450"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> LHSCost(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1451"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!WorkList.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1452"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> = WorkList.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a0c8ffe664a36e30d49c84d0aded2fe08">pop&#95;back&#95;val</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1453"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Seen.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>).second)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1454"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1455"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1456"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> OpCost = GetCostForArg(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, LShape.NumColumns);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1457"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OpCost + LHSCost &gt;= LHSCost)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1458"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1459"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1460"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LHSCost += OpCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1461"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ToFlatten.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1462"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1463"><span class="doxyHighlight">        WorkList.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a7efd1f0c1206d95e4fe01a9b49a57b82">append</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;op&#95;begin(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;op&#95;end());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1464"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1465"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1466"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We compare the costs of a vector.reduce.add to sequential add.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1467"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AddOpCode = IsIntVec ? Instruction::Add : Instruction::FAdd;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1468"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MulOpCode = IsIntVec ? Instruction::Mul : Instruction::FMul;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1469"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> ReductionCost =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1470"><span class="doxyHighlight">        TTI.getArithmeticReductionCost(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1471"><span class="doxyHighlight">            AddOpCode, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;VectorType&gt;</a>(LHS-&gt;getType()),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1472"><span class="doxyHighlight">            IsIntVec ? std::nullopt : std::optional(FMF)) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1473"><span class="doxyHighlight">        TTI.getArithmeticInstrCost(MulOpCode, LHS-&gt;getType());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1474"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> SequentialAddCost =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1475"><span class="doxyHighlight">        TTI.getArithmeticInstrCost(AddOpCode, ElementType) &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1476"><span class="doxyHighlight">            (LShape.NumColumns - 1) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1477"><span class="doxyHighlight">        TTI.getArithmeticInstrCost(MulOpCode, ElementType) &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1478"><span class="doxyHighlight">            (LShape.NumColumns);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1479"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((LHSCost + ReductionCost - SequentialAddCost) &gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a>(0))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1545"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Compute \\p Result += \\p A &#42; \\p B for input matrices with left-associating</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1548"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// We can fold a transpose into the operand that is used to extract scalars.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1549"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This is the first operands with row-major and the second with</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1565"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.isColumnMajor() == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.isColumnMajor() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1568"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumComputeOps = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1569"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1570"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a6370e29617c71c8081bbbc68d6058403">setFastMathFlags</a>(FMF);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1572"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.isColumnMajor()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1573"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Multiply columns from the first operand with scalars from the second</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1574"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operand. Then move along the K axes and accumulate the columns.  With</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1575"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this the adds can be vectorized without reassociation.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1722"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a053e31c808de70c3ce24bdab299ecb2f">ForceFusion</a>)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1724"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1725"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShapeInfo LShape(MatMul-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase/#aabd76e6a8a23a5af1ce4d3c310d88bcd">getArgOperand</a>(2), MatMul-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase/#aabd76e6a8a23a5af1ce4d3c310d88bcd">getArgOperand</a>(3));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1726"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShapeInfo RShape(MatMul-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase/#aabd76e6a8a23a5af1ce4d3c310d88bcd">getArgOperand</a>(3), MatMul-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase/#aabd76e6a8a23a5af1ce4d3c310d88bcd">getArgOperand</a>(4));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1727"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1728"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> R = LShape.NumRows;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1729"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> = RShape.NumColumns;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1730"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> M = LShape.NumColumns;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1731"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;EltType = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;VectorType&gt;</a>(MatMul-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>())-&gt;getElementType();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1732"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1733"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VF = std::max&lt;unsigned&gt;(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1734"><span class="doxyHighlight">        TTI.getRegisterBitWidth(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a8bb3b1ccf19b8c85429b777dfa4a0166a183020fbea95c99db23f6d3594f4c4af">TargetTransformInfo::RGK&#95;FixedWidthVector</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1735"><span class="doxyHighlight">                .getFixedValue() /</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1736"><span class="doxyHighlight">            EltType-&gt;getPrimitiveSizeInBits().getFixedValue(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1737"><span class="doxyHighlight">        1U);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1738"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1739"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Cost model for tiling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1740"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1741"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For tiling to be beneficial, we need reuse either along the R or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1742"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the C axis.  We vectorize along the R axis so that means at least</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1743"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3 elements.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1744"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Also consider cost of copying if operands alias.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1745"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (R &lt;= VF &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> == 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1746"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1747"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Then we need enough elements to exceed the number of vector</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1748"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// registers we have.  Note that this is an oversimplification since</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1749"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fusing also takes some extra loads which may exceed the number of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1750"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reloads necessary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1751"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Op0Regs = (R + VF - 1) / VF &#42; M;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1752"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Op1Regs = (M + VF - 1) / VF &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1753"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Op0Regs + Op1Regs &gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1754"><span class="doxyHighlight">           TTI.getNumberOfRegisters(TTI.getRegisterClassForType(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1755"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1983"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1984"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Deal with lifetime.end calls that might be between Load0/Load1 and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1985"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// store. To avoid introducing loads to dead objects (i.e. after the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1986"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// lifetime has been termined by @llvm.lifetime.end), either sink them</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1987"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// after the store if in the same block, or remove the lifetime.end marker</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1988"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// otherwise. This might pessimize further optimizations, by extending the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1989"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// lifetime of the object until the function returns, but should be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1990"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// conservatively correct.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1991"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation">MemoryLocation</a> Load0Loc = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation/#a18e5a3f1d71ba10a624f2a8e5121cf1f">MemoryLocation::get</a>(LoadOp0);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1993"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;StoreParent = Store-&gt;getParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1994"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FusableOpsInSameBlock = LoadOp0-&gt;getParent() == StoreParent &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1995"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   LoadOp1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a1b4bf7c97cdc8159fd73d48063f0b250">getParent</a>() == StoreParent;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1996"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Idx = 0; Idx != LifetimeEnds.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>();) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1997"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/intrinsicinst">IntrinsicInst</a> &#42;End = LifetimeEnds&#91;Idx&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1998"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Inc = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1af45c4dc83c083c5ae914d96fd3ce96">make&#95;scope&#95;exit</a>(&#91;&amp;Idx&#93;() &#123; Idx++; &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1999"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the lifetime.end is guaranteed to be before the loads or after the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2000"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// store, it won&#39;t interfere with fusion.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2001"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DT-&gt;dominates(End, LoadOp0) &amp;&amp; DT-&gt;dominates(End, LoadOp1))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2002"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2003"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DT-&gt;dominates(Store, End))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2004"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2005"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If all fusable ops are in the same block and the lifetime.end is in a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2006"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// different block, it won&#39;t interfere with fusion.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2007"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FusableOpsInSameBlock &amp;&amp; End-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>() != StoreParent)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2008"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2009"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2010"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the loads don&#39;t alias the lifetime.end, it won&#39;t interfere with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2011"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fusion.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2012"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation">MemoryLocation</a> EndLoc = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation/#afc51de08aefeeaabc77fefacc869dbd4">MemoryLocation::getForArgument</a>(End, 1, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2013"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!EndLoc.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation/#a9550ce4a179e46db37f653ce28feca7a">Ptr</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2014"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2015"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AA-&gt;isNoAlias(Load0Loc, EndLoc) &amp;&amp; AA-&gt;isNoAlias(Load1Loc, EndLoc))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2016"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2017"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2018"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If both lifetime.end and the store are in the same block, extend the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2019"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// lifetime until after the store, so the new lifetime covers the loads</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2020"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we introduce later.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2021"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (End-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>() == StoreParent) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2022"><span class="doxyHighlight">          End-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a54507f01d7d06127068ee0663233511d">moveAfter</a>(Store);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2023"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2024"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2025"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2026"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise remove the conflicting lifetime.end marker.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2027"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ToRemove.push&#95;back(End);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2028"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(LifetimeEnds&#91;Idx&#93;, LifetimeEnds.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#acd9e771a3296c6b24146955754620557">back</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2029"><span class="doxyHighlight">        LifetimeEnds.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#ad97688dfe9cd802e2a0691cbe620218a">pop&#95;back</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2030"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Inc.release();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2031"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2032"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Lower load instructions, if shape information is available.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2103" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/#a49e11eb7774b75fb97d50d78ed1de951"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/#a49e11eb7774b75fb97d50d78ed1de951">VisitLoad</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loadinst">LoadInst</a> &#42;Inst, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> &amp;Builder) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2105"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> == ShapeMap.end())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2468"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2469"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Generate remarks for matrix operations in a function. To generate remarks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2470"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// for matrix expressions, the following approach is used:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2471"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 1 Use the inlined-at debug information to group matrix operations to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2472"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    DISubprograms they are contained in.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2473"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 2 Collect leaves of matrix expressions (done in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2474"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    RemarkGenerator::getExpressionLeaves) for each subprogram - expression</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2475"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     mapping.  Leaves are lowered matrix instructions without other matrix</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2476"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     users (like stores) in the current subprogram.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2477"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 3 For each leaf, create a remark containing a linearizied version of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2478"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    matrix expression. The expression is linearized by a recursive</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2479"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    bottom-up traversal of the matrix operands, starting at a leaf. Note</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2480"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    that multiple leaves can share sub-expressions. Shared subexpressions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2481"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    are explicitly marked as shared().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2482" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a73de135507c562022c3d7eecb0699894">RemarkGenerator</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2483" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#abea0b15956ed54d0552ea2e189d8b19b"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mapvector">MapVector&lt;Value &#42;, MatrixTy&gt;</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#abea0b15956ed54d0552ea2e189d8b19b">Inst2Matrix</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2484" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a7cd071961c14e58b4dd2e0469e643856"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationremarkemitter">OptimizationRemarkEmitter</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a7cd071961c14e58b4dd2e0469e643856">ORE</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2485" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a45704943fab88f965bfc21f58cc25281"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a45704943fab88f965bfc21f58cc25281">Func</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2486" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a4ef49bb5322c89feceb7a78f5e01a179"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a4ef49bb5322c89feceb7a78f5e01a179">DL</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2487"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2488" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a73de135507c562022c3d7eecb0699894"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a73de135507c562022c3d7eecb0699894">RemarkGenerator</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mapvector">MapVector&lt;Value &#42;, MatrixTy&gt;</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#abea0b15956ed54d0552ea2e189d8b19b">Inst2Matrix</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2490"><span class="doxyHighlight">        : <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#abea0b15956ed54d0552ea2e189d8b19b">Inst2Matrix</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#abea0b15956ed54d0552ea2e189d8b19b">Inst2Matrix</a>), <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a7cd071961c14e58b4dd2e0469e643856">ORE</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a7cd071961c14e58b4dd2e0469e643856">ORE</a>), <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a45704943fab88f965bfc21f58cc25281">Func</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a45704943fab88f965bfc21f58cc25281">Func</a>),</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2492"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2493"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Return all leaves of the expressions in \\p ExprsInSubprogram. Those are</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2496"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Value &#42;, 4&gt;</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2497" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a53d241b242a10e4f387b39e4497054db"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#a53d241b242a10e4f387b39e4497054db">getExpressionLeaves</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallsetvector">SmallSetVector&lt;Value &#42;, 32&gt;</a> &amp;ExprsInSubprogram) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2499"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Expr : ExprsInSubprogram)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2500"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Expr-&gt;getType()-&gt;isVoidTy() ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2542"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CM = <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp-/lowermatrixintrinsics/remarkgenerator/#abea0b15956ed54d0552ea2e189d8b19b">Inst2Matrix</a>.find(Root);</span></CodeLine>
